root.name: pop'n music 6
root.description: Pop'n Music 6 also works as a Key Disc to play the append discs Pop'n Music 3 and Pop'n Music 4. Pop'n Music! / Popper Head (Rave Girl) - 9B Pop'n Music 5FRENCH POP / Une fille dans la pluie / Fabienne Haber (Belle) - 9BHEAVY ROCK / INNOVATION / Des-ROW (Fat Boy) - 9BHI-TENSION / どうなっちゃったって / チャーミングス (Lisa) - - / H / -MONDO POP / BICYCLE / sugireo (Sugi-kun) - 9B / - / -PARAPARA / ウルトラハイヒール~I JUST WANNA TELL YOU / dj TAKA feat.ANGEL (Tamako) - - / H / -PERCUSSIVE / 西新宿清掃曲 / サイモンマン (Mr. KK) - - / - / EXPOWER ACO / 君が好きだよ～守って守ってあげるから～ / 新堂敦士 (Makoto) - - / H / -SENTAI / ビーマニ戦隊ポップンファイブ / うた:石原慎一 さくし:RYO (Akagi_Takayuki) - - / H / -SKY / それから / パーキッツ (Poet) - 9BSOFT ROCK / Homesick Pt.23 / ORANGENOISE SHORTCUT (Rie Chan) - 9B Hidden SongsHidden AC SongsBLUES / 悪の野望はブルース / ナヤ～ン・ブラザーズ・バンド (Warudoc) - 10 / 19GIRLS POP / Picnic / three berry icecream (Yuri-chan) - 18 / 20 Hidden CS SongsCLASSIC 6 / maritare! / Waldeus von dovjak (Harmanof) - 8 / 17 / EXKIDS / 月にいったミルク / さとむら ひなた (Anzu) - 10 / 17 / EXMIND / Seal / NAKATEK (Boy) - 11 / 18 / EXOI PUNK / 悲しいね / ブタパンチ (Uowo) - 17 / 27 / EXSPIRITUAL / lasting / shaker boo (Ageha) - 9 / 12SWING / 今夜、森をぬけて / Sana (music by Yuichi Tsuchiya) (Sanae Chan) - 13 / 24 Pop'n Stage Songs80's Pop / Girl from the Portrait / 1000 RIVER featuring (Dick) - 10 / 23FOLKY / White day dream / 馬場一嘉 (Sholl-Kee) - 9 / 18FUNK / Let's go dancing / Benji (Milly) - 7HOUSE / A LOVE WE NEVER KNEW / JULIANNEEDISON (Mimi) - 13 / 27 / EXJ-DANCE / Let’s me Let’s go / Ma-You (Judy) - 9 / 16KUNG FU / the Clawthe Dragon / Re Mongkoh (Dragon) - 4REGGAE / BoaBoaLady! / jam master'73 (The Mokky) - 13 / 23SCAT / cat's Scat / Q-Mex (Inu Sentai) - 8 / 18SKA CORE / Go no stopping / CATAPILA (Fat Boy) - 9SPANISH / ¿Que vas a hacer? / TRAVIESO (Roma) - 14TROPICAL / beAchest beAch / Sana Meets Togo PAPA (Troppy) - 13 / 23 Unlock InformationTime unlocks are always available. The first set of songs is released after 2 hours, and all songs will have been unlocked after 6 hours.To unlock Funk, select Fat Boy as your character, and clear Rock 'n' Roll as either your first or second stage.To unlock Spanish, clear Romance Kayou as your second stage with 70000 or more points.To unlock Ska Core, pick Dami~Yan as your character, and clear J-Tekno as your first stage.To unlock Kung-Fu, play with a character from any Pop'n Stage hidden song (Dragon, Milly, Inu Sentai, Fat Boy, Judy (Pop'n Stage outfit), Jorky, Dick, The Mokky, Troppy, Mimi, or Roma).To unlock Folky, clear your first stage with a max combo of 49 or more.To unlock Reggae, clear your second stage with a max combo of 38 or more.To unlock J-Dance, select Judy as your character. Either the Pop'n Stage or AC 5 outfit is ok.To unlock House, play Sazae-san as your first or second stage and clear with 33 or fewer bads.To unlock 80's Pop, in your first stage, get a single 8 in your score.To unlock Spiritual, select Tran as your character and clear Sympathy as your first stage.To unlock Scat, pick Sumire as your character and clear Sympathy as your first stage with more than 80000 points.To unlock Swing, select Sanae Chan as your character, and get a 3 or 7 as the last digit of the max combo for your first stage.To unlock Kids, get a score of 250000 or more as the top score of 9-Line Normal mode.To unlock Mind, Pick Boy (AC 6 outfit) as your character and get a "border clear" for all your stages. For a border clear, you should have only one capsule of life into the clear zone, or exactly 70%.To unlock Girls Pop, on either your first or second stage, play Anime Heroine, Samba, Musical, or Yodel, and clear it with 90000 or more points. Or, get a 250 or greater max combo on your first stage, and 300 or greater on your second stage.To unlock Oi Punk, clear US Hard Rock as your first stage, and Melo Core as your second stage.To unlock Tropical, play as Uowo.To unlock Classic 6, clear Yodel as your first stage with 85000 or more points and Romance Kayou as your second stage with a max combo of 60 or more and a score of 90000 or more.To unlock Blues, get a score of 100000 on your first stage and a max combo of 500 or more on your second stage. Alternatively, get a score of 66666 on your first and second stages combined, or a max combo of 6, 66, or 666 on any stage.
